title: Secluded Northumberland valley where you're surrounded by wild ponies and ancient forts
description: This hidden gem in Northumberland's Cheviot Hills offers over 12,000 acres of unspoilt terrain with Iron Age hillforts and free walking access

title: Ancient fingerprint found on 2,400-year-old Danish war boat
description: More than a century after its discovery, Scandinavia’s oldest plank boat is finally giving up new secrets. By analyzing ancient caulking and cords from the Hjortspring boat, researchers uncovered traces of pine pitch and animal fat — materials that likely came from pine-rich regions east of Denmark along the Baltic Sea. This suggests the vessel, used by a band of Iron Age warriors who attacked the island of Als over 2,000 years ago, may have sailed across open waters on a long, carefully planned mission.

title: Ancient fingerprint found on 2,400-year-old Danish war boat - ScienceDaily
description: Ancient fingerprint found on 2,400-year-old Danish war boat ScienceDaily

title: Chandrayaan, space programmes India's modern expressions of ancient scientific heritage: Rajnath Singh
description: Chandrayaan mission: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh says India's Moon, Mars and Sun missions blend ancient scientific heritage with modern technology, linking culture, spirituality and national security at Maha Shivaratri event in Coimbatore recently

title: China’s green push colliding with America’s fossil fixation
description: The world’s two largest economies are making opposite bets on how to power the future — and both bets carry enormous risks. China is racing to dominate clean-energy industries while still leaning heavily on coal. United States is rhetorically doubling down on fossil fuels even as its private sector keeps pouring money into renewables.
